channel.title: [Help] Delta right click context menu ID's
channel.description:
Ok, the one thing that deltas bug me the most the context menu's everytime it states an object, npc, or item it display's the ID with it too :( i managed to remove the item's from displaying the ID, but i cant find the npc method that makes this show... anyone know where its located, or know how to remove it?
example: talk-to RuneScape Guide (945). [img]http://phpgame.bugs3.com/contextids.png[/img]

item.title: [Help] Delta right click context menu ID's
item.dc:creator: @shank_beast shank beast
item.description:
@shank_beast wrote:

It’s probally located (client sided) keep looking, you shud find it.

Read full topic
item.source: [Help] Delta right click context menu ID's
